short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Get notified when you visit a malicious website imitating another

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
OpenSafe is a chrome extension that notifies users if they're visiting a malicious URL that might qualify as a phishing scam. For example, the following URLs:

1. https://maybank2u.com
2. https://mаybаnk2u.com

They look the same but they aren't. They're using the cyrillic letter 'a' which is misleading and can point to different websites.
